about_the_game:
Mysteries of FangClaw is a horror, action, and exploration-focused game that invites players to survive in a dark and mysterious mine. After being betrayed by an old friend, Baxter Hemlock embarks on a challenging mission to investigate and defeat the enigmatic monsters. In a world where time is of the essence and survival strategies are essential, with each discovery and solved puzzle, he will get one step closer to the exit.

The game presents a compelling story with challenging puzzles and a fight for survival against monsters. The day-night cycle requires players to manage time effectively to stay alive. Everything Baxter needs to survive is hidden within the samples he must find and the battles he will face against the monsters.

Dangers lurk around every corner of the mine. For Baxter to survive, he must make strategic decisions, carefully manage his resources, and defeat his enemies with the traps he finds. Every night, facing the monsters emerging from the dark depths of the mine requires quick thinking and agility. Finding the right equipment and materials under tough conditions is essential for survival.

Monsters are much stronger than you, don’t forget that! If they catch you...

The dark labyrinths of the mine are not only filled with dangers but also hidden spots where you can safely hide. Before the monsters find you, learn to conceal yourself in the shadows. Not every encounter is a fight for life and death—sometimes escaping and leaving no trace is the best strategy. Observe the creatures' movements, listen to their sounds, and plan your next move.

Deep within the mine lies a world full of secrets. Ruins, ancient mechanisms, locked rooms, and mysterious documents take players into the dark past of the gold mine. During your explorations, every clue you find and every puzzle you solve will bring you one step closer to the exit. But be careful—each new discovery might bring danger with it.

Progressing through FangClaw Mine requires more than courage and speed—it demands the use of your wits. Ancient mechanisms, intricate locks, and mysterious codes challenge players to unravel the mine's secrets. Each puzzle opens a window into the dark history of the mine and provides new paths for advancement. But beware, some puzzles are fraught with danger, and a wrong move could cost you your life. Think carefully, follow the clues, and uncover the deepest secrets of the mine.

Solving puzzles is not just critical for progress but also for survival.

name: Mysteries Of FangClaw

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 CPU @ 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: An immersive horror-adventure game. Betrayed by a trusted friend, Baxter finds himself trapped in an abandoned gold mine. Set traps, gather creature samples, and make life-or-death decisions to survive. Can you face the horrors lurking in the darkness of the night?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Bulgarian, Dutch, Japanese, Russian, Turkish*, Ukrainian, Greek, Swedish, Danish, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
